      • createTopic

        public void createTopic(java.lang.String topicName,
                        int partitions,
                        short replicationFactor)
        Creates a topic in Kafka. If the topic already exists this does nothing.
        Parameters:
        topicName - the topic name to create.
        partitions - the number of partitions to create.
        replicationFactor - the number of replicas for the topic.

      • waitForBrokerToComeOnLine

        public void waitForBrokerToComeOnLine(int brokerId,
                                      long timeoutDuration,
                                      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
                               throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Utility method for waiting until a broker has successfully joined a cluster.
        Parameters:
        brokerId - The if of the broker to wait for.
        timeoutDuration - How long to wait before throwing a TimeoutException.
        timeUnit - The unit of time for how long to wait.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - If the broker is not online before the timeoutDuration has expired.
